text: arau yisakale takbaraa aralambana karaichila te'omlokaka koraa ha’la, ‘tomalokara pratipalake ki aratirna karaiche’? Te'omloke ka’le, ‘mahakalyana’. Yisakale satkarma karae te'omlokara babe ache e'i prthiraita mangala arau akhiraatara abasa iyatakaiyo utkrsta; arau muttakbisakalara abasasthala kimana ye utkrsta
